We follow initiatives, policies and legislative files related to the development of digital skills and certification in Europe, these include: 
Europe 2020 strategy, A Digital Agenda for Europe, the New Skills and Jobs Agenda, the Digital Single Market, Education and Training 2020.

membership: We are a member of the European E-Skills Association (EeSA)
relevant_communication: Certiport, a Pearson VUE business is engaged with supports the Digital Skills and Jobs Coalition, All Digital Week, EU code week, as well as European Vocational Skills Week, Safer Internet Day, and European Cyber Security Month.
goals__remit:
Certiport is dedicated to helping people succeed through certification. Our globally recognized credentials are aimed at enhancing individual productivity, marketability, and value. 
 
Certiport, a Pearson VUE business is now the leading provider of certification exam development, delivery, and program management services.  Certiport exams are delivered through an expansive network of over 14,000 Certiport Authorized Testing Centers worldwide. 
 
Certiport delivers more than three million exams each year through the secondary, post-secondary, workforce, and corporate technology markets in 148 countries and 26 languages. 
 
Certiport works with industry-leading certification providers and manages a sophisticated portfolio of leading certification programmes including: 
Microsoft® Office Specialist 
Microsoft® Technology Associate 
Microsoft® Certified Educator 
Adobe® Certified Associate 
Autodesk® Certified User 
Autodesk® Certified Professional 
Intuit® QuickBooks Certified User 
IC3 Digital Literacy Certification 
Entrepreneurship and Small Business Certification
